description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Your peerless sword skill defies belief, striking more times than most enemies can track. Make five melee Strikes. The first two Strikes are made with no multiple attack penalty, and the last three are made at only a -5 penalty (or a -4 if you are wielding an agile weapon). After this Limit Break resolves, all of your attacks until the end of the turn are made at a -10 multiple attack penalty, even if you are wielding an agile weapon or have another effect which reduces multiple attack penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feat-effects.Item.YIfPnQGflktiyGYE]{Effect: Limit Break MAP Penalty}
